import React from "react"; import ReactDOM from "react-dom/client"; import "./style.css" const Form = () => { const [form_data,setFormData] = React.useState({ email : "", password : "", confirm_password : "", checked : "" }) function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault() } return (
) } const Element = <>
const root = ReactDOM.createRoot(document.getElementById('root')); root.render(Element)
